Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (args.Length < 2)              {                  if (args[1] == "vmware")                  {                      running = true;                      type = types.Vmware;                  }                  else if (args[1] == "broche")                  {                      running = true;                      type = types.Broche;                  }                  else                  {                      throw new ArgumentNullException("Not a correct argument");                  }              }
